DOC.brief_summary: Objectives.-Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) non-invasive stimulation method become widely use therapeutic tool neuropsychiatric research . The aim study Evaluate therapeutic impact different frequency repetitive transcranial stimulation ( 1HZ , 10HZ ) OCD patient . Material Methods ; Forty five patient OCD participate study . All patient fulfil diagnostic criterion DSM-IV-TR . The mean age patient 27.1+4.5 year . Each patient subject follow : Yale-Brown obsessive compulsive scale ( Y-BOCS ) , Hamilton Anxiety Rating Scale ( HAM-A ) , Clinical Global Impression - Severity scale ( CGI-S ) . The patient randomly classify three equal group use close envelop : 1st group receive 1 Hz rTMS 100 % RMT , 2nd group receive 10 Hz rTMS intensity 100 % RMT 3rd group sham group receive sham stimulation total 2000 pulse every day group 10 session . Follow patient use previous scale end session 3 month later .
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Obsessive Compulsive Disorders
DOC.criteria: All patient fulfil diagnostic criterion DSMIVTR Patients comorbid psychiatric disorder .
